title: Boycott the U.S.? Not Gonna Happen!
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: A Wall Street Journal headline warns that a movement is afoot among Canadians to boycott U.S. products. On the basis of news media commentary about the trade wars, you might assume that commercial links between the U.S. and Canada are on track to shrink. To the contrary, I believe that the data one quarter and one year from now will show an expansion of trade. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:summary:
A Wall Street Journal headline warns that a movement is afoot among Canadians to boycott U.S. products. On the basis of news media commentary about the trade wars, you might assume that commercial links between the U.S. and Canada are on track to shrink. To the contrary, I believe that the data one quarter and one year from now will show an expansion of trade.
